languages.text: Whenever the wearer is the target of an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, the attacker becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The wearer will perform their lowest cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} attack against this enemy (including attacks with {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapons{/g}).

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wearer is the target of an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attack of opportunity{/g}, the attacker becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 turn. The wearer will perform their lowest cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} attack against this enemy (including the ranged weapon).

Whenever the wearer is the target of an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, the attacker becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The wearer will perform their lowest cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} attack against this enemy (including attacks with {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapons{/g}).

languages.text: 每当装备者遭到{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}时，都会使攻击者{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。此外，装备者还会自动反击该名敌人（包括{g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}远程{/g}武器在内），使用{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}消耗最低的攻击方式进行反击。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is the target of an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, the attacker becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The wearer will perform their lowest cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} attack against this enemy (including the {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon).

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者遭到{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}借机攻击{/g}时，都会使攻击者{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}一回合。此外，装备者还会自动反击该名敌人（包括远程武器在内），使用{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}消耗最低的攻击方式进行反击。

languages.text: Когда персонаж становится целью {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}, атакующий получает {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепление{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Также персонаж применяет против этого противника атаку, требующую меньше всего {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} (включая атаки из {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}дистанционного{/g} оружия).
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is the target of an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, the attacker becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The wearer will perform their lowest cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} attack against this enemy (including attacks with {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}ranged weapons{/g}).

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж становится целью {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атаки по возможности{/g}, атакующий получает {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепление{/g} на 1 ход. Также персонаж применяет против этого противника атаку, требующую меньше всего {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} (включая атаки из дистанционного оружия).

Когда персонаж становится целью {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}атаки по возможности{/g}, атакующий получает {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}ослепление{/g} на 1 ход. Также персонаж применяет против этого противника атаку, требующую меньше всего {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} (включая атаки из дистанционного оружия).

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}のターゲットになると、攻撃者は1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}になる。使用者はこの敵に対して最も少ない{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}コストの攻撃を行う。（{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}武器も含める）
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is the target of an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, the attacker becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The wearer will perform their lowest cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} attack against this enemy (including the {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon).

traits.locale_text: 自身が{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}機会攻撃{/g}を受ける度、相手に1ターンの間{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}効果を付与。その敵に最も少ない{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}コストの攻撃を行う（遠隔武器も含める）

languages.text: Cada vez que el portador es objetivo de un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g}, su atacante queda {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. El portador realiza su ataque con menor coste de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} contra ese enemigo (incluyendo ataques {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}a distancia{/g}).
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is the target of an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, the attacker becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The wearer will perform their lowest cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} attack against this enemy (including the {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon).

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el portador es objetivo de un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}ataque de oportunidad{/g}, su atacante queda {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g} durante 1 turno. El portador realiza su ataque con menor coste de {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} contra ese enemigo (incluyendo ataques a distancia).

languages.text: Immer wenn der Träger Ziel eines {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffs{/g} ist, wird der Angreifer 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g}. Der Träger führt gegen diesen Feind seinen Angriff mit den geringsten {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-Kosten aus (einschließlich {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}Fernkampfwaffe{/g}).
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is the target of an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, the attacker becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The wearer will perform their lowest cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} attack against this enemy (including the {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon).

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Träger Ziel eines {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Gelegenheitsangriffs{/g} ist, wird der Angreifer 1 Zug lang {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}geblendet{/g}. Der Träger führt gegen diesen Feind seinen Angriff mit den geringsten {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-Kosten aus (einschließlich Fernkampfwaffe).

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur est la cible d'une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g}, l'attaquant subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. L'utilisateur lance contre cet ennemi son attaque la moins coûteuse en {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} (y compris à l'aide de l'arme {g|Encyclopedia:RangeAreaAttacksGlossary}à distance{/g}).
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is the target of an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, the attacker becomes {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. The wearer will perform their lowest cost {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} attack against this enemy (including the {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon).

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur est la cible d'une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}attaque d'opportunité{/g}, l'attaquant subit l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g} pendant 1 tour. L'utilisateur lance contre cet ennemi son attaque la moins coûteuse en {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} (y compris à l'aide de l'arme à distance).
